announcements.details: The COVID 19 Vaccination team will be back on Sunday 12th February 2023. All those who were not able to get the jabs should come prepared with their Ghana cards and old vaccination cards.

announcements.details: Offertory and Bidding Prayers at the first and second masses will be led by the Christian Mothers and the Knights of St John International respectively.
